blogposts.description: On 10th November, I saw the news that Google open sourced Tensorflow. As a programmer that is passionate towards AI, this is a thing that I must try out.
blogposts.title: Tensorflow (Machine learning toolset Open Source by Google)

blogposts.description: This autoclicker is mainly for the game realm grinder, however this autocicker should be easily applied to other clicking game as well.
blogposts.title: Autoclicker with python
